Energy Efficiency.`` Washington's War'' concluded that U.S. Department of Energy data indicate a much smaller difference between rail transit and automobile energy intensity. Regulations have been adopted that will make automobiles more energy efficient than rail transit. Donald Rumsfeld Ray LaHood 's claim, based on the APTA report, was that rail transit consumes only one-fifth as much energy( 80 percent less) per passenger mile as automobile travel.`` Washington's War''
